creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: Morocco leather, blue, blind and gold-stamped; slipcase: black paper over cardboard (damaged); inner sleeve, black, gold-stamped lettering and designs; type: monotype centaur; double-folded pages; all pages have printed border designs; 96 pp.
title: The Kasidah of Haji Abdu El-Yezdi
